title: support configuring IndexWriter max thread count in solrconfig
description: Lucene 3.1.0 added the ability to configure the IndexWriter's previously fixed internal thread limit by calling setMaxThreadStates. This parameter should be exposed through Solr configuration.

comments.author: Patrick Hunt
comments.content: Added configuration parameter as "indexConfig/maxIndexingThreads". Also added a test and example solrconfig.xml.
